longBusinessSummary: Nestl√© India Limited manufactures and sells food products in India and internationally. It provides milk products and nutrition, including dairy whitener, condensed and UHT milk, yoghurt, maternal and infant formula, baby food, and health care nutrition products; powdered and liquid beverages comprising instant coffee and tea, as well as ready to drink beverages; prepared dishes and cooking aids, such as noodles, sauces, seasonings, pasta, cereals, and pet foods; and confectionery products consisting of bar countlines, tablets, and sugar confectionery products. The company was incorporated in 1959 and is headquartered in Gurugram, India.
